TextLibrary.Text: Khalkus
I have to travel back to Bartonia and let the Queen know this Ogre is dead.
I have to travel back to Bartonia and let the Queen know this Ogre is dead.
I have to travel back to Bartonia and let the Queen know this Ogre is dead.
I have to travel back to Bartonia and let the Queen know this Ogre is dead.

Aye, ye must. But there be a lot here to do first, lad. Sure Dugog were the boss, but no matter how smart an Ogre is, he's not one to think this up by himself. Somethin' or someone were pullin' his strings, and ye ought to be lookin' for them. If ye would just...

Aye, ye must. But there be a lot here to do first, lad. Sure Dugog were the boss, but no matter how smart an Ogre is, he's not one to think this up by himself. Somethin' or someone were pullin' his strings, and ye ought to be lookin' for them. If ye would just...

Aye, ye must. But there be a lot here to do first, lass. Sure Dugog were the boss, but no matter how smart an Ogre is, he's not one to think this up by himself. Somethin' or someone were pullin' his strings, and ye ought to be lookin' for them. If ye would just...

Aye, ye must. But there be a lot here to do first, lass. Sure Dugog were the boss, but no matter how smart an Ogre is, he's not one to think this up by himself. Somethin' or someone were pullin' his strings, and ye ought to be lookin' for them. If ye would just...
No. The Queen may very well agree with you Khalkus, but it's my duty to consult her first.

Oh aye, I know well enough that ye Agarians are all about Kings an' Queens, duty, honor, an' all that guff. But it just seems to me that...

Enough! My mind is made up. We head back to Bartonia first.
